mil3.1.11:0.3: Aspiration as a Distinguishing Characteristic of Faith Question
mil3.1.11:1.1: “How, venerable sir, is aspiration a distinguishing characteristic of faith?”
mil3.1.11:1.2: “Just as, your majesty, a spiritual aspirant, having seen the liberated mind of others, aspires to the fruit of stream entry, or to the fruit of once-returner, or to the fruit of non-returner, or to the fruit of arahantship, practices for the attainment of the unattained, for the achievement of the unachieved, and for the realisation of the unrealised.
mil3.1.11:5.1: Aspiration as a Distinguishing Characteristic of Faith Question eleventh
